column4: if i kill software center, it still runs when i re-open the software center. it doesn't change anything...

you can try a long shot like:   ps auxf |grep <part of package name>

if that returns something, get the number to the left (first column) and do "kill -HUP <numbeR>"  or if you feel adventurous try "kill -9 number"  ..@ your own risk
